name: PixelJunk™ Monsters 2
description: PixelJunk™ Monsters is back with the simple, yet highly strategic real-time tower defense gameplay gameplay of the original title, now with updated graphics and brand new multiplayer modes!
minimum_requirements: Prozessor: i3-3000 series or better Dual Core CPU. i5 or better recommended. Arbeitsspeicher: 4 GB RAM Grafik: Nvidia GTX460 1GB or AMD HD 6850 or better. Speicherplatz: 4 GB verfügbarer Speicherplatz
